reflection
Class Reflection

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Thread
        |
        +--reflection.Reflection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Reflection
extends java.lang.Thread

The Reflection level, is the interface between the world and the graphic display. It handles over all requests, but sperating task syntax.
